attributes.action: Petiton to stop immigrants in the UK claiming benefit
attributes.additional_details: I want the goverment to stop all benefits to immigrants who enter the uk, all eu and non eu immigrants should not be entitled to our state benefit, unless they have paid into the system for at least 5 years...I want immigrants to pay for there medical care not get it FREE, if this was done we would save billions of pounds, Immigrants only come to this country because everything is free and easy, so if this was to change it will drop the amount of immigrants that cross our boarder on a daily basis.. Other countrys have this rule in place so why cant we..
